data.title: Build a Node.js + Firebase-based agentic applic...

content.text: Build a Node.js + Firebase-based agentic application called CityPulse AI that:
Ingests real-time data from multiple sources (APIs + user reports with images/videos & location).
Uses Gemini's multimodal API to summarize duplicate reports (e.g., traffic), analyze media, and classify events.
Stores and organizes events in Firebase Realtime Database by category, location, and time.
Predicts emerging issues (e.g., power outages from clustered reports) and generates intelligent alerts.
Displays all events on a React + Firebase map dashboard, with optional sentiment analysis to show city "mood".
Fully deployable on Firebase Hosting / Firebase Studio.
üîç Now ‚Äî about your non-working prototype:
Please send me any or all of the following so I can fix your prototype:
index.js or main Node.js server file
Firebase config & how you're initializing it
Any frontend errors you're seeing
The .env or Firebase credentials config (remove sensitive keys)

currentFile.content:
# CitySync Plus - Local Development Environment
# DO NOT COMMIT THIS FILE TO VERSION CONTROL

# ================================
# NEXT.JS CONFIGURATION
# ================================
NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=CitySync Plus
NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VERSION=1.0.0
NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_DESCRIPTION=Universal Urban Intelligence Platform

# ================================
# FIREBASE CONFIGURATION
# ================================
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY=AIzaSyAsuVzIutbbMb9Hkh3FEHs5F1Nw1D27Auo
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN=citysync-plus.firebaseapp.com
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=citysync-plus
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=citysync-plus.firebasestorage.app
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=863906276094
NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID=1:863906276094:web:9fedf74de34b2abf113baf

# Firebase Admin SDK (Server-side only)
FIREBASE_ADMIN_PROJECT_ID=citysync-plus
FIREBASE_ADMIN_CLIENT_EMAIL=firebase-adminsdk-fbsvc@citysync-plus.iam.gserviceaccount.com
FIREBASE_ADMIN_PRIVATE_KEY_ID=0208622bd4d5de90d4fce36737649bf1e4c00b33

# ================================
# DEVELOPMENT SETTINGS
# ================================
NODE_ENV=development
PORT=3000
HOST=localhost
DEBUG_MODE=true

# ================================
# FEATURE FLAGS
# ================================
FEATURE_VOICE_INTERACTION=true
FEATURE_AR_MODE=true
FEATURE_BLOCKCHAIN_VERIFICATION=false
FEATURE_EDGE_AI=false
FEATURE_REAL_TIME_COLLABORATION=true

# ================================
# DEFAULT CITY SETTINGS
# ================================
DEFAULT_CITY_ID=new-york
DEFAULT_TIMEZONE=America/New_York
DEFAULT_LANGUAGE=en

content.text: Build a Node.js + Firebase-based agentic application called CityPulse AI that:
Ingests real-time data from multiple sources (APIs + user reports with images/videos & location).
Uses Gemini's multimodal API to summarize duplicate reports (e.g., traffic), analyze media, and classify events.
Stores and organizes events in Firebase Realtime Database by category, location, and time.
Predicts emerging issues (e.g., power outages from clustered reports) and generates intelligent alerts.
Displays all events on a React + Firebase map dashboard, with optional sentiment analysis to show city "mood".
Fully deployable on Firebase Hosting / Firebase Studio.
